text:
Executive Director, FUSE Coworking - Lincoln, NE - Full-Time Fuse Coworking is a shared workspace where Lincoln’s startups, freelancers, telecommuters and corporate innovation teams work and collaborate. We have a thriving work community that contributes to our members’ productivity and happiness. Our core values are collaboration, community, inclusivity and sustainability. We are located in the Haymarket in Lincoln, Nebraska, in the midst of over 100 startups within a four block area.

Fuse is hiring for the position of Executive Director. This person will build on the momentum that we have created and lead Fuse further forward in the areas of coworking, entrepreneurial education and startup community leadership. The Executive Director will be responsible for managing all operations, culture and growth at Fuse.

For more info and to apply: https://careers-nelnet.icims.com/jobs/4439/executive-directo...
